content: Are all the files in .superhero/[project name]-files/ getting added to the initial message? I just added a big file to the directory and doesn't look like it was added.
After analyze content, how are those two files added to the initial message to the LLM?
Yes, so modify getProjectFiles to find *any* text files in that directory, not just those two specific ones.
When uploading files to project context, either only allow those file types or put up an alert when any other file type was attempted.
